content: The reason the Democrats were this careless and abusive with the national security apparatus is because they were dead certain Hillary was going to win the election. They were sure there would be no answering for their abuses of power, because that would only happen if Trump won, which was impossible. They figured it would be Hillary people taking over the national security apparatus — and like they’re going to investigate the Obama intelligence community abusing its power to spy on Hillary’s opponent in the election.
